Talon:

Talon continued atending tucson, hoping doing her best; she was a w=
arrior not a nurse


From: Sandy 
Sent: Friday, January 22, 2010 9:08 AM
To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come =
back


  
Tucson holds strong and keeps coherent through the examination. H=
e remains calm for Kenzo and the others, and tries not to flinch too much w=
hile being looked over.

" I - think I neutralized the venom somewhat when =
I applied a neutralizer to the affected areas. Guess - some of it managed t=
o get past that and - into my system." 

He shifts his weight slowly again.=
 Whatever was in Lamia's venom, was making his body feel fatigued. He wasn'=
t at all happy with being down for the count.

" Slag it, there's just some=
 things I miss by not having my visual sensors online. I didn't hear Lamia =
sneak up on me, nor did my sonar senses catch on. I - think I might need to=
 have that checked while you're at it. Oh, one more thing, save Nightstrike=
 for me, I'll be sure he gives us a full work up as to what the enemy has i=
n store for us. And if he doesn't talk, I'll just have to stay in his face =
until he does. No way in Primus's name I'm letting him get away with anythi=
ng."
